alert.note: Alert for Brazoria Islands; Coastal Brazoria; Coastal Galveston; Coastal Harris; Coastal Matagorda; Inland Brazoria; Inland Galveston; Inland Matagorda; Matagorda Islands (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued February 02 at 11:18PM CST until February 03 at 3:00AM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Visibility near or less than one quarter mile in dense fog. * WHERE...Inland Matagorda, Inland Brazoria, Inland Galveston, Coastal Harris, Coastal Matagorda, Coastal Brazoria, Coastal Galveston, Matagorda Islands and Brazoria Islands Counties. * WHEN...Until 3 AM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Sea fog is likely to create low visibility, including stretches of whiteout conditions until a cold front arrives with rain and gusty northwesterly winds.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Brazoria Islands; Coastal Brazoria; Coastal Galveston; Coastal Harris; Coastal Matagorda; Inland Brazoria; Inland Galveston; Inland Matagorda; Matagorda Islands
